items.summary: Create a new 'Text Formatting' section in the admin panel as a separate tab alongside existing sections (Content, Hero Theme, Clinics, Services, Reviews, Social Media, Footer)

Add backend storage for text formatting settings that stores font size and letter formatting (font family, font weight, letter spacing, text transform) separately for headings and body text across homepage sections: hero, overview/about, services, and footer

Create TextFormattingManager admin component with section-based controls allowing independent adjustment of font size, font family, font weight, letter spacing, and text transform for both headings and body text in each homepage section (hero, overview/about, services, footer)
Apply stored text formatting settings to Hero component's text elements, using heading settings for headline and body settings for subtext, without affecting blog pages
Apply stored text formatting settings to Overview/About components' text elements, using heading settings for section titles and body settings for description text, without affecting blog pages
Apply stored text formatting settings to Services component's text elements, using heading settings for service titles and body settings for service descriptions, without affecting blog pages
Apply stored text formatting settings to Footer component's text elements, using heading settings for section titles and body settings for footer content text, without affecting blog pages
